price: (18) And We have sent down rain from the sky in a measured amount and settled it in the earth. And indeed, We are Able to take it away.
arabic: وَأَنزَلۡنَا مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءَۢ بِقَدَرٖ فَأَسۡكَنَّٰهُ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ وَإِنَّا عَلَىٰ ذَهَابِۭ بِهِۦ لَقَٰدِرُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wa-anzalnā mina al-samāi māan biqadarin fa-askannāhu fī al-arḍi wa-innā ʿalā dhahābin bihi laqādirūna
translations: then We cause it to settle
